content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with a Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) and a Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5)

### Copper Ore Mining and Transport Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) connected to a series of Transport Belts and a Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5)
- BeltGroup connecting positions (-25.5, -70.5) to (-23.5, -70.5) and (-21.5, -67.5) to (-21.5, -69.5)

### Iron Ore Mining Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) and a Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5)

### Iron Plate Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-21.0, -62.0) with a Wooden Chest at position (-20.5, -63.5) and a Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -64.5)

### Additional Storage Chests
- Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -54.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -61.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (3.5, 0.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Connecting Entities
- Ensure that there are no gaps in belt placement when attempting to connect entities. Verify the positions of all belts in the intended path to ensure continuity.

### Index Errors in Code
- Check the indices used in your code to ensure they are within the valid range of the list or array you are accessing. This will prevent "list index out of range" errors.

### Errors with Inserter Operations
- Ensure that inserters have access to source items. Verify that the source entities contain items that the inserters can pick up.

### Errors with Fuel Management
- Regularly check and refuel entities like Burner Mining Drills to prevent them from running out of fuel and halting operations.
